an4.45:1.1: Once, the Blessed One was dwelling at Sāvatthi in Jeta Forest, Anāthapiṇdika's Monastery.
an4.45:1.2: Then, as the night progressed, Rohitassa, a strikingly handsome young angel, having illuminated the entire Jeta Forest, approached the Blessed One, bowed down to him, and stood to one side. StandinXXXX
